## 조건부 확률

::: {#7d0fee1d .cell execution_count=7}
``` {.python .cell-code}
selected = democrat[liberal]
prob(selected)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=7}
```
np.float64(0.5206403320240125)
```
:::

진보(liberal) 성향 중 민주당(democrat)의 비율

::: {#a5cc9d09 .cell execution_count=8}
``` {.python .cell-code}
def conditional(proposition, given):
  return prob(proposition[given])
conditional(liberal, given=female)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=8}
```
np.float64(0.27581004111500884)
```
:::
:::


::: {#3c5ca1f8 .cell execution_count=9}
``` {.python .cell-code}
prob(liberal & female) / prob(female)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=9}
```
np.float64(0.2758100411150089)
```
:::
:::


$P(A|B) = \frac{P(A and B)}{P(B)}$

::: {#6931e6a8 .cell execution_count=10}
``` {.python .cell-code}
print(prob(female) * conditional(liberal, given=female))
print(prob(female & liberal))

0.14834652059241227
```
:::
:::


$P(A and B) = P(B)P(A|B)$

::: {#04f8a1a0 .cell execution_count=12}
``` {.python .cell-code}
print(conditional(female, given=liberal))
print(prob(female) * conditional(liberal, given=female) / prob(liberal))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
0.5419106203216483
0.5419106203216482
```
:::

$P(A|B) = \frac{P(A)*P(B|A)}{P(B)}$
